verbs.description: Seldom if ever [V: has] an American president so explicitly expressed admiration for an autocrat as Trump did on Friday — not only excusing Kim Jong Un ’s gun - barrel grip on power but envying it .

[ARGM-TMP: Seldom if ever] has [ARG0: an American president] [ARGM-MNR: so explicitly] [V: expressed] [ARG1: admiration for an autocrat] [ARGM-MNR: as Trump did on Friday] — [ARGM-PRD: not only excusing Kim Jong Un ’s gun - barrel grip on power but envying it] .
Seldom if ever has an American president so explicitly expressed admiration for an autocrat as Trump [V: did] on Friday — not only excusing Kim Jong Un ’s gun - barrel grip on power but envying it .
